name: ORD_DICOM_SCHED_PROC_STEP
description: This table contains information about orders' DICOM scheduled procedure step.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SPS_ID
columns.description: The DICOM Scheduled Procedure Step ID.

columns.name: SPS_MOD_ID
columns.description: The identifier (ID) of the provider (SER) record of the modality that this scheduled procedure step was generated for.

columns.name: SPS_PROC_ID
columns.description: The identifier (ID) of the procedure (OPE) record of the modality that this scheduled procedure step was generated for.

columns.name: SPS_APPT_PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The contact serial number of the appointment that this scheduled procedure step was generated for.
